summary: Germans kidnap an American major and try to convince him that World War II is over, so that they can get details about the Allied invasion of Europe out of him.
cast: James Garner|Eva Marie Saint|Rod Taylor|Werner Peters|John Banner|Russell Thorson|Alan Napier|Oscar Beregi Jr.|Ed Gilbert|Sig Ruman|Celia Lovsky|Karl Held|Martin Kosleck|Marjorie Bennett|Henry Rowland|Otto Reichow|Hilda Plowright|Walter Friedel|Joseph Mell|Richard Alexander|Leon Alton|Chris Anders|Rudolph Anders|Charles Bastian|Leslie Bradley|Paul Busch|Dick Cherney|Gene Coogan|Howard Curtis|Henry Dar Boggia|George Dee|Luis Delgado|John Dennis|Joe Di Reda|James Doohan|Harold Dyrenforth|Horst Ebersberg|Kort Falkenberg|Rudy Germane|John Gilgreen|Stuart Hall|John Hart|Lars Hensen|Adolf Hitler|Walter Janovitz|Michael Jeffers|Roy Jenson|Danny Klega|Kurt Landen|Barry Macollum|Victor Masi|Owen McGiveney|Eric Micklewood|Jeff Morris|Sol Murgi|Richard Peel|Charles H. title: 36 horas
